channel.title: [release] ice blades [release]
channel.description:
my laptop got broken along with my sword wich was half way finished so i quickly made this to replace it.
it should wield as a shield i havent tried in game coz im realy bad at putting customs into clients, if any body uses it and adds in game can u tell me if it worked? and post ints
[IMG]http://i727.photobucket.com/albums/ww274/ak268/iceshield.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?4k4dtajahnv]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?4k4dtajahnv[/url] in the folder i gzipped drop and wield and added drop in wield in meta so you can do what ever
yes i know it looks like a d scimm but i didnt ever put the d scimm model into the meta i was using

item.title: [release] ice blades [release]
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:15, topic:268373”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=354188.msg2715620#msg2715620 date=1237628180]

i didnt fuking use d scimm get ur facts right noobs

You’re gay. Is that fact “right enough”?
[/quote]Ranger Calm Down With The Language.

and at ak226688 , this isn’t your work , i will have to inform a moderator to this to lock it.
None of this is yours this is all JaGeX Limited© their work.
You just added it 4times and moved/rotated it around.
//Reported[/quote]

Hmmk.
It’s just, he puts me on his fail list. At least i try…

Read full topic
